title: [QUESTION] Latest `libSkiaSharp.so`
body: Hello, where can i find the latest `libSkiaSharp.so` file as its not attached to the github release?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Just want to check why you are looking for the .so directly?

If you are using .NET and just want to use it, it is actually available on nuget:
 - https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux
 - https://www.nuget.org/packages/HarfBuzzSharp.NativeAssets.Linux

There is also one with out the fontconfig dependency:
 - https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.NoDependencies

comments.author: NotOfficer
comments.body: Ah thanks, i didn't know there was a package for the linux dependencies.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Closing this as you should be able to use the NuGet. Feel free to reopen (or a new one) if there are issues.
